userreviews.userReview: Có nhiều trò khá thú vị có thể giúp các em nhỏ hứng thú với khoa học. Sách hướng dẫn cụ thể, có hình ảnh minh hoạ sinh động. Ngoài ra còn có phần giải thích thêm về khía cạnh khoa học ngắn gọn, dễ hiểu. Mình có thử một số trò với Bối Bối và Sushi. BB với Sushi thích lắm. Sẽ là nguồn cảm hứng cho mình tiến hành một số hoạt động trong lớp.
Excellent resource for family library! My kids loved the experiments...and so did I. It's the type of book that you will actually use and refer back to over and over again.

All I can say is that this book is my 6 yr old's favorite book! We have done over half of the activities and experiments in this book. The supplies are things that are often just things around the house, so req little prep and no extra cost. This was a life saver this past winter when we had snow days galore and the kids were bored. I highly recommend this book, it keeps the kids busy, it's educational and fun too!
It tells you how to make lots of things and it has lots of colours.
My boys and I have enjoyed trying out several of these experiments. It's something fun to do on random weekends and over the summer.

description: Here are over fifty fantastically fun projects that use easy-to-find everyday materials. Make things that fly, fling, spin, swim, whoosh, zoom and ooze, and discover the surprising science behind them.
title: Big Book of Science Things to Make and Do
